name: AI GrAid
author: AI GrAid

sections.description:
Efficient and accurate AI-powered essay grading saves educators time and effort.

With AI GrAid for LearnDash, educators can rely on advanced artificial intelligence to grade factual essay questions efficiently.

Say goodbye to endless hours of manual grading and experience the convenience and accuracy of automated essay grading.

This powerful tool streamlines the grading process, allowing educators to save time and provide accurate and insightful feedback to every student.
sections.faq:
How can I start using AI-GrAID

To start using the plugin, first install it and then register for free account on aigraid.com. In the AI-GrAiD menu set up your API Key. Follow documentation for more information.

How to set up the plugin

To set up the plugin correctly, please refer to the documentation

short_description: AI GrAid for LearnDash is the ultimate solution for time-strapped educators. It incorporates the power of AI to grade essay questions efficiently.
